Posts.Content: Danishgirl66 wrote: I was diagnosed with ilc 5/09.  My last PET 4/13 was completely normal.  In Oct. my tumor markers were up so had bone scan, Pet, and CT.  It showed problems in my abdomen.  Endoscopy and colonoscopy showed "thickening" of the lower part of my stomach and duodenum.  The biopsy showed lobular mets in the wall of my colon.  Has anyone else had such a progression?  I want to know what to expect.  I am 66 yrs old. Dx 5/2009, ILC, 5cm, Stage IIIC, 19/21 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Dx 10/2013, ILC, Right, 5cm, Stage IV, metastasized to other, 19/19 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Hormonal Therapy 6/9/2014 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Chemotherapy 6/16/2014 Halaven (eribulin) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lobular Abdominal Mets Danishgirl66 pajim
